skins.shipDescription: Atlanta-class light cruiser ¨C San Juan, Hull Number CL-54.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am San Juan, Atlanta-class anti-aircraft cruiser number four. I escorted many carrier groups: Enterprise, Saratoga, several of the Essex-class. I fought alongside them all. Let's just say I have a lot of experience in aircraft carrier support combat!
skins.acquisition: I am San Juan, Atlanta-class anti-aircraft cruiser number four. I've served as a support unit for the Eagle Union's carrier fleets. You seem like a person up to your ears in work, Commander... so I now offer to support you!
skins.login: Clock's ticking! We gotta get to work¡ª Oh, come on! Here, let me straighten your collar. You're a mess!
skins.details: I set the trap just like the book said, but why haven't I caught anything yet? That's strange...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Supporting a carrier group is just watching the skies all day. I wish supporting you was as easy...
skins.secretaryIdle3: My sisters haven't been causing you any trouble, have they? Oh, thank goodness...
skins.secretaryTouch: I know you're tired, Commander, but you don't have to whine about it. ... Okay, once you finish your work, how about I give you a massage?
